attributes.action: Deport ALL Foreign Nationals and Illegal Immigrants who commit Serious Crimes IMMEDIATELY they have served their sentence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many Foreign Nationals and Illegal Immigrants are failing to be deported after committing serious crimes against the people or property of UK Residents.   Too often we are reminded of THEIR human rights at the expense of our own Human Rights and this needs reversing!   As soon as they have served any sentence within this country they should be deported within 1 week with NO APPEAL as UNDESIRABLES!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
